title: Top Apple Shareholders
snippet: Apple's top shareholders are Vanguard, BlackRock, Arthur Levinson, Tim Cook, and Jeff Williams. Apple's 12-month trailing revenue and net income were $391.04 billion and $93.74 billion, respectively, as of Feb.

title: Apple Stock Ownership - Who Owns Apple in 2025? | WallStreetZen
snippet: Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) is owned by 62.05% institutional shareholders, 0.12% Apple insiders, and 37.83% retail investors. Vanguard Group Inc is the largest individual Apple shareholder, owning 1.40B shares representing 9.47% of the company.
